name: Unidentified_Small_Craft_Flight_flight_commander
display_name: Unidentified Small Craft Flight flight commander
content: A human male flight commander taught the Royal Imperial Academy's Small Craft Flight course during the Age of the Empire. On one occasion, he set up a training exercise which involved the Imperial cadets flying speeder bikes through Reitgen Hoops in Galactic City. During that exercise, the cadets Ciena Ree and Thane Kyrell got their bikes entangled together but still managed to win the race. While he was annoyed with the cadets for finding a loophole, he reluctantly awarded them twenty five marks each; splitting the prize between them.
